oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Poster announcing a revival led by Adlai Loudy, who is pictured on the poster. He proclaims, "No book but the Bible, No creed but the Christ, No plea but the Gospel, No name but the Divine."

Broadsides
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Adlai Loudy, born in 1892, was a noted evangelist, singer, and composer of spiritual songs. Beginning in the 1920s, he and his wife, Dona, traveled throughout the eastern United States and Canada. He died December 27, 1984.
